Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the xComfort skill you can use Alexa to control your lighting, scenes, and devices via the xComfort Bridge. Make sure that the Remote Access for your xComfort Bridge is activated before you continue. Then check if the installed version on your xComfort Bridge is at least 3.22 or higher. 

To get started, find and select the “xComfort Bridge” skill in the Alexa App and click "Enable". After being asked by the skill enter your xComfort Bridge Serial number and AuthKey and click submit. You can find this information on the backside of your xComfort Bridge. The account linking process should be successfully finished.

To control your devices with Alexa, you have to tell Alexa to find your devices first. Ask Alexa to find your devices with: “Alexa, find my devices”. Now you are able to do things like:

„Alexa, turn on the Livingroom light“
„Alexa, activate the Home Scene“
„Alexa, set the Heating in the Living room to Comfort”

Further information can be found in the xComfort Bridge App.
